data.value: Go to definition Right click: Peek definition

data.value: New GUID Hint: To create a new GUID, type 'guid' (without quotes) and select it

data.value: Mark... Mark symbol, breakpoint or bookmark

data.value: Paste text from clipboard Right click: Paste over line Ctrl: Paste and select next Shift: Paste and select next (whole word)

data.name: T_ResultFilterTip
data.value: Filter items in this menu. Use space to separate keywords.

data.name: CMDT_OpenDonatePage
data.value: Open your browser and donate to project Codist

data.name: CMD_PostIssue
data.value: Post your opinions in the issues page

data.name: OT_ConfigurationFileTip
data.value: Use the following buttons to backup your settings or share the file with others

data.name: OT_DonateLinkTip
data.value: Recommended donation value is $19.99. But you can modify the amount to any value if you like

data.name: OT_FeatureChangesTip
data.value: Changes will take place on NEWLY OPENED document windows. Currently opened document windows WILL NOT BE AFFECTED

data.name: OT_FeatureControllersTip
data.value: Use the following checkboxes to control features provided by Codist.

data.name: OT_NavigationBarTip
data.value: Provides an enhanced navigation bar for C# and Markdown languages

data.name: OT_QuickInfoTip
data.value: Provides enhancements to Quick Info (code tooltips)

data.name: OT_ScrollbarMarkerTip
data.value: Provides additional markers on the scrollbar

data.name: OT_SmartBarTip
data.value: Provides a dynamic floating toolbar in your code editor

data.name: OT_SyntaxHighlightTip
data.value: Provides advanced syntax highlight and comment taggers

data.name: CMDT_ConfigureSyntaxHighlight
data.value: Open the syntax highlight configuration dialog window

data.name: OT_AdditionalQuickInfoNote
data.value: The following options allow adding more items to the Quick Info

data.name: OT_AddShowSyntaxClassifcationInfo
data.value: Add "Show Syntax Classification Info" command to Smart Bar

data.name: OT_AddShowSyntaxClassifcationInfoTip
data.value: Displays results of classifiers and taggers for selected content

data.name: OT_AllAncestorTypesTip
data.value: Displays base type of a symbol along inheritance relations

data.name: OT_AlternativeStyleTip
data.value: Uses a concise, reorganized style (from symbol name, parameters, containing symbol, type to generic arguments) to display C# symbols

data.name: OT_AutoIncrementVsixVersion
data.value: Automatically increment version revision number in .vsixmanifest file

data.name: OT_AutoIncrementVsixVersionTip
data.value: Add 1 to the last number of your VSIX version, by modifying the .vsixmanifest file in the project, after each successful build

data.name: OT_BaseTypeTip
data.value: Displays base type of a symbol

data.name: OT_BehaviorTip
data.value: This page changes the behavior of Smart Bar, which by default appears when you select something in a text editor window

data.name: OT_BottomMarginTip
data.value: This option adds extra margin below each line in code editor

data.name: OT_BrowserParameter
data.value: Browser parameter (optional, empty to use URL as parameter):

data.name: OT_ClickAndGo
data.value: Click and go to source code of symbol definition

data.name: OT_ClickAndGoTip
data.value: Makes symbols in Quick Info clickable to the source code

data.name: OT_ColorInfoTip
data.value: Shows color information for predefined color names and hexidemical values

data.name: OT_CompilerDirectiveTip
data.value: Draws circles for compiler directives on the scroll bar

data.name: OT_ConfigSyntaxNote
data.value: To configure syntax highlight and manage comment taggers, click this command under the Tools menu:

data.name: OT_ConfirmRemoveSearchEngine
data.value: Are you sure to remove search engine <NAME>?

data.name: OT_ConfirmResetSearchEngine
data.value: Do you want to reset search engines to default ones? ALL existing items will be REPLACE by default items.

data.name: OT_CSharpMarkerNote
data.value: Markers for C# type and member declarations and special directives

data.name: OT_CSharpNote
data.value: This page changes the behavior of C# Quick Infos (code tool tips)

data.name: OT_DesclarationTip
data.value: Displays declaration information of a symbol if it is not a public instance one, as well as event or delegate signatures

data.name: OT_ExtensionNote
data.value: This page contains functions for Visual Studio extension developers

data.name: OT_ExtraLineMarginNote
data.value: Add extra space between lines in code document window

data.name: OT_ExtraXmlDocSize
data.value: More max-height for C# XML Documentation:

data.name: OT_ExtraXmlDocSizeTip
data.value: This option plus max-height is the max height for the C# XML Documentation

data.name: OT_ForceGrayscaleTextRenderingTip
data.value: If you feel text in the code window or the main window blurry and spotted with colors. Check these options to make text rendered in grayscale and see whether it helps.

data.name: OT_HideQuickInfoUntilShift
data.value: Hide Quick Info until Shift key is pressed

data.name: OT_HideQuickInfoUntilShiftTip
data.value: Suppresses tool tip until pressing Shift key

data.name: OT_HighlightSyntaxRangeTip
data.value: Highlights the range of an item, on which the mouse is hovering, in the code editor

data.name: OT_IncludeMemberRegionsTip
data.value: Displays #region and #endregion directives defined within members of types in the drop-down menu of navigation bar

data.name: OT_IncludePartialTypeMembersTip
data.value: Displays members defined in other code files for partial types in the drop-down menu of navigation bar

data.name: OT_IncludeRegionsTip
data.value: Displays #region and #endregion directives in the drop-down menu of navigation bar

data.name: OT_InheritDocTip
data.value: Supports inheritdoc which uses XML Doc in referenced symbol

data.name: OT_InheritedInterfacesTip
data.value: Displays inherited interfaces implemented by the symbol

data.name: OT_InheritXmlDoc
data.value: Inherits from base type or interfaces

data.name: OT_InheritXmlDocTip
data.value: Displays XML Doc from base types or interfaces if it is absent in active symbol

data.name: OT_InterfaceImplementationTip
data.value: Displays the interface member if it is implemented by the symbol

data.name: OT_InterfacesTip
data.value: Displays interfaces implemented by the symbol

data.name: OT_LimitItemSizeNote
data.value: Limit the maximum size of each items in Quick Info, preventing any item from taking up the whole screen

data.name: OT_LineNumberTip
data.value: Draws line number values on the scroll bar

data.name: OT_LineOfCodeTip
data.value: Displays number of lines for current type or members in the drop-down menu of navigation bar and tool tips

data.name: OT_LocateBrowser
data.value: Locate your web browser to view search results

data.name: OT_LongMethodNameTip
data.value: Draws names of long methods on the scroll bar

data.name: OT_MacTypeLink
data.value: Note: For best text rendering effects, it is recommended to use MacType, which can be downloaded from: https://github.com/snowie2000/mactype/releases

data.name: OT_ManualSmartBarTip
data.value: Don't automatically display Smart Bar when the selection is changed, combine with the following option

data.name: OT_MatchSymbolTip
data.value: Draws squares for other locations the same as current symbol under caret on the scroll bar

data.name: OT_MaxHeightTip
data.value: This option limits the max height of a Quick Info item

data.name: OT_MaxWidthTip
data.value: This option limits the max width of a Quick Info item

data.name: OT_MemberDeclarationLineTip
data.value: Draws lines indicating spans of type and member declarations on the scroll bar, with corresponding syntax highlight colors

data.name: OT_MethodDeclarationSpotTip
data.value: Draws squares for each methods on the scroll bar

data.name: OT_MethodOverloadsTip
data.value: Displays method overloads and applicable extension methods

data.name: OT_MethodParameterListTip
data.value: Displays parameters of methods in the drop-down menu of navigation bar

data.name: OT_NaviBarNote
data.value: Currently navigation bar works for C# and markdown documents only

data.name: OT_NaviBarShortcutKeys
data.value: Default shortcut keys to access the menus of the navigation bar: Ctrl+1, Ctrl+1: Edit.SearchClassMember Ctrl+1, Ctrl+2: Edit.SearchDeclaration Ctrl+1, Ctrl+3: Edit.SearchDeclarationInProject

data.name: OT_NaviBarUpdateNote
data.value: The above options will take effect when the navigation bar is repopulated

data.name: OT_NoMarginBetweenWrappedLines
data.value: Don't add margin between wrapped lines

data.name: OT_NumericFormsTip
data.value: Displays decimal, hexidecimal, binary forms of a number

data.name: OT_OverrideXmlDocTip
data.value: Reformats the XML Documentation, making them selectable, copiable and clickable

data.name: OT_ParameterOfMethodTip
data.value: Displays information of parameter if active symbol is a parameter of a method

data.name: OT_PropertyAccessorsTip
data.value: Displays accessor types of properties ("{;;}" for getter and setter, "{;}" for getter only) in the drop-down menu of navigation bar

data.name: OT_QuickInfoNote
data.value: This page changes the behavior of all types of Quick Infos (code tool tips)

data.name: OT_QuickInfoOverrideNote
data.value: The following options allow overriding C# Quick Info with more features

data.name: OT_RegionNameTip
data.value: Draws #region names on the scroll bar

data.value: Displays #region names enclosing caret on navigation bar

data.name: OT_SearchResultBrowserNote
data.value: Browser path (empty to use system default browser):

data.value: Shows selection information, such as character count, line count, Unicode of character, etc.

data.name: OT_SelectionTip
data.value: Draws selection ranges on the scroll bar

data.name: OT_ShortcutKeysNote
data.value: Use the Keyboard mapper options page in Options dialog to reconfigure them

data.name: OT_ShowMethodParameterName
data.value: Show parameter name instead of parameter type

data.name: OT_ShowMethodParameterNameTip
data.value: Displays parameter names in method parameter list

data.name: OT_StringInfoTip

data.name: OT_SymbolLocationTip

data.name: OT_SymbolToolTipTip
data.value: Displays tool tip for items enclosing caret on navigation bar

data.name: OT_SyntaxDetailTip

data.name: OT_SyntaxDiagnosticsNote
data.value: Peek the results of syntax classifiers and taggers

data.name: OT_TaggedCommentsTip
data.value: Draws markers for tagged comments like To-Do, Hack, Note, etc. on the scroll bar

data.name: OT_TextOnlyXmlDocTip

data.value: Toggle the display of Smart Bar with Shift-key

data.name: OT_TopMarginTip
data.value: This option adds extra margin above each line in code editor

data.name: OT_TrimNonLetterRegionTip
data.value: Trims non-letter characters in region names, for instance, remove "===========" alike notations

data.name: OT_TypeNameTip
data.value: Draws names of declared types on the scroll bar

data.name: OT_UnlimitedSize
data.value: Set the above value to 0 to for unlimited size

data.name: OT_ValueOfFields
data.value: Initial value of fields and properties

data.value: Displays the initial values of fields and properties in the drop-down menu of navigation bar
